name: Cowabunga Full
description:
A heavy rain has flooded the pasture and created a deep ravine that the cows need to cross to get home. Help them back to the barn by bouncing them from one cliff to the other. As the game progresses the cows start jumping off the cliff faster and faster. Touch bonus items as the wind blows them by to receive bonus items that help you and the cow as you play.

FREE version also available.

"This is my favorite game on the iPhone. It's the only game that I keep coming back to"
-- Alex

"We have Cowabunga tournaments at house. We love this game!"
--
Avery
